statusCode.description: HTTP-style status code representing the type of page or error. 200 if the page is a job posting; 400 if it's not (e.g. a listing or error); 403 if authentication/captcha required; 503 if network/site issues; 500 if your internal error or you cannot open page directly.

status.description: Text explanation for statusCode, e.g., 'OK', 'Bad Request', 'Forbidden', etc.

statusDetails.description: Short explanation of why the status was set

jobTitle.description: Job title from the page or 'not available'

jobDescription.description: Short description of the job or 'not available'

keywords.description: Array of keyword strings for the job posting

contact.description: Contact person for the vacancy or 'not available'

company.description: Company name from the page or 'not available'

employmentType.description: Employment type (e.g. Full Time, Part Time) or 'not available'

remotePolicy.description: Remote policy (e.g. Remote, Hybrid, Onsite) or 'not available'

seniority.description: Job seniority (e.g. Junior, Senior, Lead) or 'not available'

responsibilities.description: Main job responsibilities as array of strings

requirements.description: Main job requirements as array of strings

languages.description: Languages required or preferred for the job

postedDate.description: Date the job was posted, or 'not available'

apply_url.description: Direct URL for application or 'not available'
